Description.Text: The Holiday Inn Express Laguardia Airport is Located near LaGuardia Airport. This New York hotel provides guests with a comfortable environment that is just minutes away from the excitement of New York City,Rockefeller Center. Flushing Meadow Corona Park and Marina, , Long Island and the Queens Museum of Art Flushing hotel's location. Families are sure to enjoy nearby New York attractions like the New York Hall of Science, Shea Stadium or the Statue of Liberty during their stay at this accommodations. New York hotel's, this lodging offers a relaxing and pleasant environment for business travelers.

• Citi Field - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Adelphi University - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi • St. John's University - 5 km / 3.1 mi • Chrysler Building - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi • Central Park - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi • Empire State Building - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi • Broadway - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi • Times Square - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi

Holiday Inn Express Laguardia Airport offers 74 guestrooms. Televisions come with premium satellite channels, DVD players, and VCRs. Wireless Internet access is provided along with free local calls. Coffee/tea makers are provided. Bathrooms include complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Air conditioning, climate control, and clock radios are also included. Refrigerators and wake-up calls can be requested. Cribs (infant beds) are also available. Housekeeping is provided.

Holiday Inn Express Laguardia Airport has a fitness facility. Business amenities at this 2.5-star property include wireless Internet access, meeting rooms for small groups, and business services. Guests are served a complimentary breakfast each morning. Room service is available during limited hours. This property provides a complimentary airport shuttle. The staff can arrange concierge services and dry cleaning/laundry services. Additional amenities include multilingual staff, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and an elevator (lift).
• Pets not allowed • Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is 11 AM

From LaGuardia International Airport: Approximate distance to the hotel is 2.5 miles. • Follow signs to I 278 East. • Take Exit 8/111th Street exit. • Turn left on ramp. • Turn left on Astoria Boulevard. • Merge onto 114th Street. • Cross Northern Boulevard. • The hotel is located on the right.
Guests are offered a complimentary breakfast.
